channel.title: Comments on: $2.3 Trillion Missing from Pentagon

item.title: By: don khan
item.dc:creator: don khan
item.description:
What's new, did we forget the Coalition Provisional Authority, setup in Iraq to steal our money. This beautiful package came with total immunity for our contractors. The Bush Administration stole us blind, with Halliburton, KBR, and Black Water as the biggest recipients.
u
item.content:encoded:
What’s new, did we forget the Coalition Provisional Authority, setup in Iraq to steal our money. This beautiful package came with total immunity for our contractors.
The Bush Administration stole us blind, with Halliburton, KBR, and Black
Water as the biggest recipients.

u

item.title: By: jackiemearound
item.dc:creator: jackiemearound
item.description:
They spent it on the Pentagon.
As fast as they can in Afghanistan.
Got us in hock because of Iraq.
Spent it gone at the Pentagon.
And then they pardoned all the liars, thieves, and war criminals because:
"We must move forward, not look back".
I think they are all in this together, and all this political stuff is a dog and pony show to distract us from noticing how rich they got in process, looting We the People of a cool $2.3 trillion.
Nice.
item.content:encoded:
They spent it on the Pentagon.

As fast as they can in Afghanistan.

Got us in hock because of Iraq.

Spent it gone at the Pentagon.

And then they pardoned all the liars, thieves, and war criminals because:

“We must move forward, not look back”.

I think they are all in this together, and all this political stuff is a dog and pony show to distract us from noticing how rich they got in process, looting We the People of a cool $2.3 trillion.

Nice.
